title: Utilization and Application of Prior Knowledge in Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational instructional design theories and practical experience in science fields
context.additional_context: Project-based learning course for current practitioners to integrate and apply prior knowledge, utilizing personal devices (BYOD) for collaboration and resource sharing.

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain at least three sources of prior knowledge (personal experience, frameworks, expert networks) in the instructional design process.
Learners can demonstrate a process of revising and validating design drafts using collective knowledge systems such as the ADDIE or SAM models.
Learners can develop creative design solutions based on prior knowledge in science project tasks and incorporate peer feedback.

resources: Instructional Design Template for Science Disciplines

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
